issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description
The method toBlob() which converts a photo to blob format only exists on iOS. When ran on Android it throws an error. 

*Note*

toBlob() is undocumented but there is a method called read() which is [documented|http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/3.0/#!/api/Titanium.Filesystem.File-method-read] that does the same thing and works on both platforms.

h5.Steps To Reproduce

1. Import the attached project
2. Run on iOS device/simulator
3. Run on Android device/simulator

h5.Actual Results

*Actual Result on iOS*

The app runs on iOS on both 3.3.0.GA and 3.2.3.GA SDK and also 3.3.0 and 3.2.3 CLI

*Actual Result on Android*

The app fails to run on Android on both 3.3.0.GA and 3.2.3.GA SDK and also 3.3.0 and 3.2.3 CLI

h5.Expected Result

The app shouldn't work on either iOS or Android due to the read() method
fields.summary: iOS: Filesystem.File - toBlob exists in iOS but not Android
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.9.4
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201407111535
Titanium SDK build: 3.3.0.GA, 3.2.3.GA
Titanium CLI, build: 3.3.0, 3.2.3
Alloy: 1.4.1
iOS Simulator 7.1
iOS Device 7.0.6
Android emulator 4.4.2
Android Device 4.4.2

comments.body: This still occurs but as the method is undocumented closing as wont fix
